text:
Fop: Pdf generation dowsn`t work with j2sdk 1.5
In the method FOTreeBuilder.startElement(String uri, String localName, String 
rawName, Attributes attlist) we have uri="" instead 
of "http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Format"
creator: shumskydv@yahoo.com
sunilgoi@yahoo.com
text:
I am a newbie to fop. I was trying a sample for converting xml to pdf and I 
get the following error

Jun 1, 2007 3:21:08 PM org.apache.fop.fo.FOTreeBuilder fatalError
SEVERE: javax.xml.transform.TransformerException: 
java.lang.IllegalStateException: endElement() called for html where there is 
no current element.file:/C:/Sunil/xpath/xmltopdf/./xml/xslt/cdcatalog.xsl; 
Line #1; Column #153; java.lang.IllegalStateException: endElement() called for 
html where there is no current element.

The xsl document is fine because I have used it in other programs to 
successfully obtain the desired outputs. I think this issue is also related to 
fop not being able to work properly in sdk 1.5

creator: sunilgoi@yahoo.com
text:
(In reply to comment #1)
Please ignore my above comment. I was a little bit hasty in trying the 
tutorial. XSLT that I was using was an html xslt not a xsl-fo xslt. Appologies 
for my ingnorance. I couldn't delete my above comment so please ignore it. 
This error has nothing to do with j2sdk1.5

creator: gadams@apache.org
text: please provide an input FO test file, output PDF file (if any), console log output (if any)

creator: gadams@apache.org
text: resolved invalid due to lack of information (FO input file, PDF output file, etc)
